translations: 用支撑物（或梁）支撑（shore 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 马里兰大学东海岸分校

sentences.sentence: The main-beams of the lower deck had to be shored with screw-jacks forthwith.
sentences.translation: 下层甲板的主梁必须立即用螺旋千斤顶进行支撑。

sentences.sentence: Only commodity work can be off-shored.
sentences.translation: 只有廉价的工作才能够外包。

sentences.sentence: Mrs Merkel has shored up her defences.
sentences.translation: 默克尔已经强化了她的防御措施。
